author: markt
msg: Work with Java 1.6 for now. Options for 1.5 (e.g. copying stuff from Harmony) can be explored once the re-write is complete if it is considered worthwhile.

author: lofwyr
msg: make independent from UIComponentTag, to support containers with JSP 2.0, but not JSP 2.1 when using Facelets only

author: arkurth
msg: Updated Windows.pm get_public_ip_address to handle a rare condition where a valid public IP address as well as an auto-generated IP address are both bound to the same interface name.  Under this condition, the auto-generated address may have been returned causing problems. Code was updated to return the valid address if one is assigned.
